description: Data Scientist walks into the courtroom crowd is cheering a hotdog is looking at her with hope
characters: Hotdog: glossy bun | Data Scientist: Data Scientist: Confident Indian female data scientist in a full-color cinematic manga panel. She has short bob cut assymetrical, vibrant red hair and cool blue glasses that glint under a spotlight and she is wearing wine red lipstick. she has a sharp v shaped chin and looks like ariana grande. She's stylish yet professional, wearing a sharp, modern blue color blazer and holding a laptop . Her posture radiates charisma and analytical authority—shoulders back, one eyebrow slightly raised, eyes focused as if addressing a jury. The background is dramatic with cinematic lighting, bold shadows, and speed lines emphasizing her presence. Manga-style clean line art with warm charm and high detail.
